ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank all patients (and the parents/guardians of pediatric patients) who agreed to participate; the members of the Infection Control Unit (I. Le Guinche, P. Husson, S. Gotty, R. Beauvais, A. MÃ©tois) and the doctors, midwives, and personnel in the units of our center for their sustained efforts to prevent and monitor healthcare-associated infections.
